comment.text: This translation key is used for the placeholder text in a form input field where users can enter a URL to upload IdP metadata XML. The text appears as a placeholder in a text input field and helps users understand what information is expected from them.

usage.context:
<div className="upload-input">
 <SsoTextInput
 className="upload-xml-input"
 maxWidth="297px"
 name="uploadXmlUrl"
 placeholder={t("UploadXMLPlaceholder")}
 tabIndex={1}
 value={uploadXmlUrl}
 hasError={!isValidXmlUrl}
 onFocus={onFocus}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and complex. "عنوان رابط للبيانات الوصفية لمزود الهوية بتنسيق لغة التوصيف الموسعة" translates to "Title of a link for identity provider metadata in Extensible Markup Language format." This is not a natural or user-friendly way to express the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان رابط لملف البيانات الوصفية لمزود الهوية (IdP)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a long, single sentence. It would be better to break it up for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان رابط لملف البيانات الوصفية لمزود الهوية (IdP).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'لغة التوصيف الموسعة' (Extensible Markup Language) is unnecessary and technically inaccurate in this context. It's not about the format of the XML itself, but the URL pointing to the XML document.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Removing the term 'لغة التوصيف الموسعة' simplifies the translation and improves accuracy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "IdP Metadata XML üçün URL" is technically correct but slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing in Azerbaijani would be "IdP Metadata XML faylı üçün URL" or "IdP Metadata XML məlumatları üçün URL". The word 'faylı' (file) makes it clearer what the URL points to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Metadata XML faylı üçün URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Bulgarian. 'URL към XML с метаданните на доставчика на идентичност' is grammatically correct but sounds awkward. A more natural translation would be something like 'URL на XML с метаданни за удостоверяващ доставчик' or 'URL към XML файл с метаданни за идентификационен доставчик'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL на XML с метаданни за удостоверяващ доставчик

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL:sta IdP:n metadata XML' is a literal translation and lacks clarity for a user. 'URL:sta' implies starting from the URL, which isn't the intended meaning.  It should specify the URL *of* the XML file.

The translation 'URL դեպի IdP Մետատվյալների XML' is a literal translation and might not be the most natural phrasing in Armenian.  'դեպի' (depi) means 'to' but may sound awkward here. A more fluent option would be something that conveys 'location of' or 'address of'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'IdP Մետատվյալների XML-ի հասցե' (Address of IdP Metadata XML) or 'IdP Մետատվյալների XML-ի URL' (URL of IdP Metadata XML).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "IdP metadatu XML vietrādis URL" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "URL to IdP Metadata XML." "Vietrādis" implies a placeholder, which isn't the intended meaning. A more appropriate translation would focus on 'URL for' or 'Address of'.

The translation 'URL para o XML com os metadados do IdP' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. A more idiomatic translation would be 'URL do XML de metadados do IdP' or 'URL para o arquivo XML de metadados do IdP'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do XML de metadados do IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Adresa URL la fişierul de metadate XML al furnizorului ID" is a bit verbose and less direct than the English "URL to IdP Metadata XML". "Furnizorul ID" could be shortened.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa URL la metadatele XML ale furnizorului ID

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the Romanian translation includes 'fișierul'. This is redundant as 'URL' implies a file location. Removing 'fișierul' makes it cleaner.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa URL la metadatele XML ale furnizorului ID

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a hyphenated word 'XML-файла' which might be better handled with a space or a more natural phrasing in Russian. While technically correct, it's slightly less fluid.

The translation 'IdP පාරදත්ත XML වෙත ඒ.ස.නි.' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'URL to IdP Metadata XML'. 'ඒ.ස.නි.' (A.S.N.) doesn't directly translate to 'URL' or any relevant term. It appears to be an abbreviation that isn't readily understood in Sinhala in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like 'IdP පාරදත්ත XML ගබඩාවල URL' (IdP Metadata XML repository URL) or 'IdP පාරදත්ත XML හි URL' (URL of IdP Metadata XML).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The abbreviation 'ඒ.ස.නි.' lacks context and might confuse users. It's better to use a more descriptive term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ඒ.ස.නි.' with a full explanation of what it represents, or ideally, use a more universally understood term like 'URL'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a hyphenated URL ("URL-адреса"). While not strictly incorrect, it's more common and readable to omit the hyphen and use a space. In Ukrainian, hyphenated URLs are less frequently seen.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адреса XML-файлу метаданих постачальника посвідчень

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Siêu dữ liệu XML IdP' is a very literal translation and could be improved for naturalness in Vietnamese. 'Siêu dữ liệu' is accurate for 'Metadata', but the phrasing as a whole feels slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL tới tệp XML siêu dữ liệu của IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a direct transliteration of 'IdP'. While understood by some, using a more descriptive term or retaining the English abbreviation might be preferable depending on the target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider clarifying what 'IdP' refers to, or leaving it as 'IdP' if the audience is familiar with the term.
